name: Vegan Almond Poppy Seed Cake. Gluten free Cake
description: Vegan Almond Poppy Seed Cake. Gluten free Cake. Spongy Moist Cake with no Gum. Use as GF Sponge Cake without poppy seeds. Vegan Gluten-free Grain-free Oil-free Recipe Makes 1 6 inch pan
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup non dairy milk (or 2 tbsp non dairy milk + 2 tbsp non dairy yogurt)
1 tsp vinegar (white or apple cider vinegar)
1 cup almond flour (I use Bob's Red Mill)
1/4 cup starch (I use 3 tbsp potato starch + 1 Tbsp tapioca/corn)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a 6 inch cake pan by greasing or lining with parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare a 6 inch cake pan by greasing or lining with parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the flax in the non dairy milk and let it sit for 5 minutes. Preheat the oven to 350 deg F / 170ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, mix the flax in the non dairy milk and let it sit for 5 minutes. Preheat the oven to 350 deg F / 170ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the maple, sugar, vanilla, vinegar. Add 1/4 tsp almond extract for stronger almond flavor or add lemon zest for lemon poppy seed cake. Mix well until sugar is mixed in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the maple, sugar, vanilla, vinegar. Add 1/4 tsp almond extract for stronger almond flavor or add lemon zest for lemon poppy seed cake. Mix well until sugar is mixed in.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, mix the almond flour, starches, salt, baking powder and soda, poppy seeds. Break the almond flour lumps if there are any, with your hand or a spatula..
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, mix the almond flour, starches, salt, baking powder and soda, poppy seeds. Break the almond flour lumps if there are any, with your hand or a spatula..

recipeInstructions.text: Add to the wet and mix well until smooth.* Transfer the batter to a greased 6 inch pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Add to the wet and mix well until smooth.* Transfer the batter to a greased 6 inch pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 degrees F / 170ºc for 30 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 degrees F / 170ºc for 30 minutes or until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 15 mins, then remove from the pan. Cool completely before slicing. Preferably refrigerate for 15 to 20 mins and then slice. Use an icing of choice. A simple lemon sugar icing works really well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 15 mins, then remove from the pan. Cool completely before slicing. Preferably refrigerate for 15 to 20 mins and then slice. Use an icing of choice. A simple lemon sugar icing works really well.
